metaTitle: personalised Santa Plate | The Christmas Elf
metaContent: Our personalised keepsake Christmas Santa plates are great for children to use year after year to those treats out for Santa and his reindeers

product.title: Personalised Keepsake Santa Plate
product.caption: Personalised Keepsake Santa Plate
info: Our personalised keepsake plates are great for children to use year after year and make putting out treats for Santa and the reindeers even more special.
Can be personalised with your children's names.
This item is completely handmade to order. Please allow up to 2 weeks for despatch.
Postage may be by Royal Mail or My Hermes and will be despatched separately to any elf products purchased.

moreImages.caption: Santa plate - Ready for the big night
